name: Baniya Matrimony - Vivah & Marriage App for Baniya
description: BaniyaMatrimony App, part of CommunityMatrimony, is the most trusted matrimony service for Baniya across the world. You can choose Baniya Bride and Groom Profiles from major cities across Delhi, India and NRIs from abroad. Thousands of Baniya have successfully found their life partner here. You too can find a Perfect Match. 100% Safe and Secure App. Register FREE.   Top BaniyaMatrimony App Features:  - Free Registration - User friendly interface and easy partner search options  - Get daily matches on mobile and email - Express your interest to shortlisted matches - Get instant alerts when there is a communication  - Shortlist and save potential matches - Interact with other members using the chat feature  Lakhs of registered members are from all major Baniya community sub-castes such as Agarwal, Guptas, Keshris / Kesarwani, Madhesiya / Kanu / Halwai, Agrahari, Barnwals, Jaiswals, Shaw / Sahu/ Teli, Rauniars, Gahoi and More..  We have members from major cities in India like Delhi, Patna, Allahabad, Mumbai, Bangalore, Ghaziabad, Jaipur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Gurgaon, Gautam Buddha Nagar and etc., besides Baniya NRIs from India, United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, United Arab Emirates and Etc.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes, Our databases of Hindi Baniya aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download app today and find your life partner!  Get the Premium Advantage  A Premium Membership means: - You can talk directly to the opposite match - You can get contact details including phone number, mail id and address.  - You can also chat live with members you like - You can send personalised messages to people you like  Baniya Matrimony App is part of Community Matrimony from Matrimony.com, which also offers language based matrimonial service like Hindi Matrimony, Marwari Matrimony, Punjabi Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony, Gujarati Matrimony, Bhojpuri Matrimony & more . The app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner. The Baniya Matrimony App is intelligently developed to give you the best results while matching you with your life partner.  You can also find your partner from other Regional Apps of Bharat Matrimony including Hindi Matrimony, Marwari Matrimony, Punjabi Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony, Gujarati Matrimony, Bhojpuri Matrimony.  Thousands of Baniya from across Delhi, India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  The Baniya Matrimony App is light and easy to use and it occupies very little phone space.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the BaniyaMatrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
